mapper.sql: a.xmp_name AS "xmpName", a.xmp_level AS "xmpLevel", a.xmp_maint_date AS "xmpMaintDate", a.xmp_end_date AS "xmpEndDate", a.xmp_status AS "xmpStatus", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", u.name AS "createBy.name", a.xmp_descp AS "xmpDescp", a.id AS "id", a.xmp_stop_date AS "xmpStopDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
